TopicTitle: Rage-built an aircraft. Works! (SUPRISED, I WAS TOO!)

Articles.Content:
Nightwish - Dark Chest of Wonders.

I didn't know what I was doing, just messing about with an aircraft and suddenly realized that this thing can fly! It even fly well! Will add video of take-off later.

No idea what came over me, I just got an idea and got going!

Anyone else experienced this strange type of phenomenon?

Edited February 3, 2014 by TimePeriod
No. If I build randomly without direction, it either is something feebly simple, or something that doesn't work.
